item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Adrienne Rich
item.description: "There must be those among whom we can sit down and weep and still be counted as warriors." -- Adrienne Rich

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Tracey Garvis-Graves
item.description: "I don't fit in your world." "Neither do I," he said, his expression tender yet resolute. "So let's make our own. We've done it before." -- Tracey Garvis-Graves

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by William Styron
item.description: "A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading." -- William Styron

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Jamie McGuire
item.description: "To douchebags!" he said, gesturing to Brad. "And to girls that break your heart," he bowed his head to me. His eyes lost focus. "And to the absolute fucking horror of losing your best friend because you were stupid enough to fall in love with her." -- Jamie McGuire

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Emily Brontë
item.description: "I wish I were a girl again, half-savage and hardy, and free." -- Emily Brontë

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Daphne du Maurier
item.description: "But luxury has never appealed to me, I like simple things, books, being alone, or with somebody who understands." -- Daphne du Maurier

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Fisher Amelie
item.description: "I-I'm just - I knew you were beautiful, knew it so very well, but it's like I just woke up to the idea. There's something about you now, Soph. You exude something and I can't quite place my finger on it. You practically glow with it. You devastate me," he said, clutching at his heart." -- Fisher Amelie

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Graham Greene
item.description: "Champagne, if you are seeking the truth, is better than a lie detector." -- Graham Greene

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "Mind you, sometimes the angels smoke, hiding it with their sleeves, and when the archangel comes, they throw the cigarettes away: that’s when you get shooting stars." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes...you're Doing Something." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Paul Sweeney
item.description: "You know you've read a good book when you turn the last page and feel a little as if you have lost a friend." -- Paul Sweeney

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Mario Vargas Llosa
item.description: "Almost seventy years later I remember clearly how the magic of translating the words in books into images enriched my life, breaking the barriers of time and space..." -- Mario Vargas Llosa

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "Sometimes life has a cruel sense of humor, giving you the thing you always wanted at the worst time possible." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Stephanie add a quote by Umberto Eco
item.description: "We live for books." -- Umberto Eco
